## Materials

<script>
// Load YAML data using js-yaml directly
fetch("materials.yml")
  .then(response => response.text())
  .then(yamlText => jsyaml.load(yamlText))
  .then(data => {
    // Loop over the "Materials" section and dynamically create material boxes
    data.Materials.forEach((material, index) => {
      const boxId = `box${index + 1}-content`;
      const boxContainer = document.createElement("div");
      boxContainer.classList.add("material-box");

      boxContainer.innerHTML = `
        <h2>${material.heading}</h2>
        <p>${material.text}</p>
      `;

      document.getElementById("material-container").appendChild(boxContainer);
    });
  })
  .catch(error => console.error("Error fetching YAML:", error));
</script>
